main event: A bright light in the sky was observed from the USCGC Matagorda at a high position angle on November 29, 1964.
interesting points: The object was confirmed to be the ECHO I satellite based on its trajectory and timing., The observation lasted for a total of 45 degrees elevation., The course of the object was measured at 180 degrees south., The conditions were partly cloudy with large swells at sea during the observation., The report was part of the Project Blue Book investigation documenting UFO sightings.
